de.exitgames.client.photon
Class LitePeer

Object
  PhotonPeer
      LitePeer

public class LitePeer
extends PhotonPeer

A LitePeer is an extended PhotonPeer and implements the operations offered by the "Lite Application" of the Photon Server SDK. This class is used by our samples and allows rapid development of simple games. You can use rooms and properties and send events. For many games, this is a good start.

Author:
developer@exitgames.com
